class_notes:
Wednesdays, 6:00-8:00 pm - Class Dates:  2/7, 2/14, 2/21, 2/28, 3/6, alternate date: 3/27


Seminar Description: Acquire the practical experience of creating a real business!  Join this 10-hour hands-on course that will take a product from concept to launch. Over 5 weekly sessions, you'll work in teams to develop, prototype, market, and sell a real product on campus. Learn how to validate your idea, build a business model, handle legal and financial considerations, promote through social media, and connect with customers. This course will give you the practical knowledge and experience to make it a reality. Guide your business from start to finish and bring your vision to life!
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
